QuestData.Title: Test Flight: The Zephyrium Capacitorium
QuestData.Description: I built an amazing device, the Zephyrium Capacitorium, and I'm sure it'll work perfectly, but... do you want to help me test it?$B$BThere's plenty of hazard pay!$B$BSpeak with my twin over there, Rally. Good luck, $n. Come back after your experiment. Or... if that's not possible due to sustained injuries, your next of kin can report to collect your pay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Rally Zapnabber and use the Zephyrium Capacitorium.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tally Zapnabber at Toshley's Station in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't be afraid! This is for science, and science is painful!
QuestData.RewardText: Wow, you made it! And not a single bruise or compound fracture! See, I told you everything would work out!$B$BHere's your pay, $n, though I factored in medical expenses and you don't need those... so that's a bonus for you!
